description: A lightweight DOM-less tile layer for Leaflet that can be used to query APIs with bounding boxes or center/radius as opposed to loading tiles.
name: leaflet-virtual-grid

scripts.bundle: rollup src/virtual-grid.js -m dist/virtual-grid.js.map -e leaflet -f umd -o dist/virtual-grid.js -n VirtualGrid
scripts.test: npm run lint && browserify test/virtual-grid.js -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] | tape-run --browser phantom | faucet
